translations.title: Shipping & Delivery Policy
translations.summary: Everything you need to know about our shipping rates, delivery times, and tracking your order.
translations.content:
Fast and Reliable Shipping

At Zucandu, we strive to deliver your musical instruments and accessories as quickly as possible. We partner with top-tier logistics providers to ensure your gear arrives safe and sound.

1. Shipping Destinations

We currently ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Whether you are looking for drum parts or professional recording gear, we can get it to your doorstep.

2. Processing Time

Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Please note that custom drum orders or out-of-stock items may take longer to prepare. You will receive a notification once your order is ready for dispatch.

3. Shipping Rates & Delivery Estimates

  • Standard Shipping: 5-7 business days ($10.00)
  • Express Shipping: 2-3 business days ($25.00)
  • International Shipping: Varies by location (calculated at checkout)

*Note: Delivery times are estimates and may be affected by customs clearance or local carrier delays.

4. Order Tracking

Once your order has shipped, we will send you an email with a tracking number and a link to the carrier's website so you can monitor your shipment's progress in real-time.

5. Damaged or Lost Shipments

Your satisfaction is our priority. If your package arrives damaged, please contact our support team at support@zucandu.com within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the package and items. We will resolve the issue immediately.
translations.meta_description: Read about Zucandu's shipping methods, international delivery times, and how to track your musical instrument orders.
